author: CBS News
title: Mel Brooks, Carl Reiner and George Takei with advice for the "Next-Greatest Generation"
description: The comedy writers and "Star Trek" actor offer some insight into resilience for challenging times, from a generation that survived a depression and world war
content: Nate 'n Al's Delicatessen in Beverly Hills, which has served show-biz folk like Mel Brooks and Carl Reiner for 75 years now, is closed this week. It's just few of blocks away from where Brooks hosts his weekly lunch; that is also suspended for now, as are mil… [+5644 chars]
